actions.name: Bite
actions.hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

features.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
features.description: The varren alpha has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The varren alpha has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the varren alpha's allies is within 2m of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
